items.sentence: Tom is trying to repair an old clock his grandfather gave him.
Tom has corrected the all mistakes. Now the report is perfect.
I don't think that you need to tell Tom what Mary plans to do.
I don't think that we should tell Tom what Mary did yesterday.
I've already been told I'm not going to be allowed to do that.
I realized I barely had enough time to do what I wanted to do.
I realized I barely had enough time to do what I needed to do.
Is it true that you called Taninna in the middle of the night?
Imogen of the Internet crochets about half of her possessions.
Is there anything else on your list that we still need to buy?
